text: Nde guigira khaŋ tɨgɨp zazera wari won ndavir gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi tɨva suirav, anan muuŋri. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar fhura nde ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ gu ana won ŋaara muun za ndɨɨi ŋkasŋkagi, nde guigira nta vuzvugɨri. Nde guigira ndir saŋv vuzvugɨrga ndɨkndɨgar vhuuŋ gu ŋkasŋka khare. Fhe Bakɨme wo buni vhuuin nde ndɨɨim, nde nta bun nzuai ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ gum ŋkasŋkagi ndigip, Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi buni nzuai mbugum ana buni vhuuiŋ bun suaŋri.
